name: Journera
description: Journera is a technology company developing the first software platform for travel-related companies to create more seamless travel journeys. Through our secure GXR (Global Experience Record), which creates a unified view of the traveler's journey in real-time, and our unique publish-subscribe and data permissions architecture, the Journera platform is enabling travel-related companies and application developers to create new travel experiences, more quickly implement and improve partnerships, and better govern their data.
